captain_notes: Captain Restart Pattern v1 applied after 16.6min inactivity. ACTION FIRST pattern active. Violation Consolidation Phase 2 in monitoring mode (Phase 1 complete, Phase 2/3 largely done via SSOT utilities + shims). SSOT remediation Priority 1 domains tagged/verified (infra/analytics/communication/web/QA). Service Consolidation Phase 1 and Handler Consolidation remain 100% complete. GitHub consolidation still blocked on auth/PR creation history; need fresh heartbeat from Agent-1/Agent-3. Agent-3 status is stale; request immediate update.

swarm_overview.cycle_focus: Violation Consolidation Phase 2 execution + SSOT remediation guardrails + GitHub consolidation unblock + fresh heartbeat from stale agents

active_initiatives.name: Violation Consolidation Phase 2
active_initiatives.description: Eliminate duplicate classes/functions and identical blocks with SSOT utilities + shims
active_initiatives.progress_summary: Phase 1 targets complete across Agents 1/2/7/8. Agent-5 reports Phase 3 blocks consolidated (27 occurrences → 0; remaining blocks 9-10 are test-only). Need confirmation of remaining low-impact blocks and updated scan counts.

active_initiatives.name: SSOT Remediation Priority 1
active_initiatives.description: Keep Priority 1 SSOT domains aligned and tagged
active_initiatives.progress_summary: Infrastructure: 24 tags added (Agent-8). Analytics: 24 tags complete (Agent-5). Communication: 18 files verified (Agent-6). Web: DOM SSOT verified (Agent-7). QA: 4 files tagged (Agent-8). Need ongoing verification during new changes.

active_initiatives.name: Phase 2 Tools Consolidation
active_initiatives.description: Consolidate monitoring/analytics/tooling to unified toolbelt entries
active_initiatives.progress_summary: Infrastructure monitoring tools unified (7 core) and archived. Analytics tools consolidated to 3 core analyzers + dashboards; unified toolbelt entries registered. Usage metrics dashboard in progress (Agent-5).

active_initiatives.name: GitHub Consolidation
active_initiatives.description: Case Variations (12 repos) + Trading Repos (3 repos) reduction
active_initiatives.progress_summary: Case Variations: 7/12 branches created (PR creation blocked by GitHub auth). Trading Repos: 2/3 complete (trade-analyzer 404). Need auth fix + conflict resolution confirmation from Agent-1; Agent-6 tracking PR status.

active_initiatives.name: Service Consolidation Phase 1
active_initiatives.progress_summary: ✅ 100% COMPLETE - PortfolioService, AIService, TheaService, UnifiedMessagingService, ConsolidatedMessagingService, ContractService all on BaseService with InitializationMixin/ErrorHandlingMixin SSOT. Handler/service boundaries verified by Agent-7.

active_initiatives.name: Handler Consolidation
active_initiatives.description: Migrate all handlers to BaseHandler pattern
active_initiatives.progress_summary: ✅ 100% COMPLETE - All 15 handlers on BaseHandler, routes updated to instance pattern, ~450 lines removed, SSOT alignment verified.
